message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm initially pricing it at $20,000. I'm confident you'll find this to be a fair offer.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? This product will truly benefit you.

I appreciate your understanding of the product's value, but $17,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $13,500, but that's as high as I can go. I really like the product, but I need to make a smart financial decision.
